2026-02-09T11:41:59.6261867Z ##[group]Run # Copy Copilot session state files to logs folder for artifact collection
2026-02-09T11:41:59.6262470Z [36;1m# Copy Copilot session state files to logs folder for artifact collection[0m
2026-02-09T11:41:59.6262990Z [36;1m# This ensures they are in /tmp/gh-aw/ where secret redaction can scan them[0m
2026-02-09T11:41:59.6263435Z [36;1mSESSION_STATE_DIR="$HOME/.copilot/session-state"[0m
2026-02-09T11:41:59.6263775Z [36;1mLOGS_DIR="/tmp/gh-aw/sandbox/agent/logs"[0m
2026-02-09T11:41:59.6264917Z [36;1m[0m
2026-02-09T11:41:59.6265150Z [36;1mif [ -d "$SESSION_STATE_DIR" ]; then[0m
2026-02-09T11:41:59.6265575Z [36;1m  echo "Copying Copilot session state files from $SESSION_STATE_DIR to $LOGS_DIR"[0m
2026-02-09T11:41:59.6265998Z [36;1m  mkdir -p "$LOGS_DIR"[0m
2026-02-09T11:41:59.6266330Z [36;1m  cp -v "$SESSION_STATE_DIR"/*.jsonl "$LOGS_DIR/" 2>/dev/null || true[0m
2026-02-09T11:41:59.6266736Z [36;1m  echo "Session state files copied successfully"[0m
2026-02-09T11:41:59.6267021Z [36;1melse[0m
2026-02-09T11:41:59.6267323Z [36;1m  echo "No session-state directory found at $SESSION_STATE_DIR"[0m
2026-02-09T11:41:59.6267665Z [36;1mfi[0m
2026-02-09T11:41:59.6298566Z shell: /usr/bin/bash -e {0}

2026-02-09T11:41:59.6298972Z   DEFAULT_BRANCH: main
